data.title: Historical List of Full-Time Faculty
data.meta_description: The following is a historical individuals taught as appointed full-time faculty at Osgoode Hall Law School. To view our current faculty, visit the Osgoode Faculty page. While every effort has been made to ensure accuracy, please contact the External Relations & Communications Office to report any errors or omissions. Deans of Osgoode Hall Law School […]
